ProjectTitle: Get the PICTURE: PIn1 pathway as a target to prevent Chronic Thromboembolic pUlmonary hypeRtEension
InitialFeedbackHistory:
06/07/2023
Sharing: please note that this section asks about sharing of data underlying your publications, not about the publications themselves or data transfer with colleagues as part of the project. You can consider using a repository, eg www.ebi.ac.uk or KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you can also apply access restrictions if needed for both data sharing and preservation, for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing.
